mapper.select: SELECT CODE_ID, DESCRIPTION, IFNULL(CNT, 0) AS COUNT FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_CODE_M WHERE CODE_ID IN ('HT01', 'HT02', 'HT03', 'HT04', 'HT05')) CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT TASTE_CD, count(*) AS CNT FROM TB_CHICKEN_CONSUME_HIS WHERE CONSUMER = #{userId} GROUP BY TASTE_CD) CHICKEN_HIS ON CODE.CODE_ID = CHICKEN_HIS.TASTE_CD ORDER BY CODE_ID
